originalText.text: They leave you waiting for ever. Even if you sign the waiting list the girl with the blond hair will let others cut you. I waited 2 hours when there was Noone in the waiting room and people just walked in signed in after me and were allowed to cut. I complained and they tell me I'm registered already. This office is unorganized and terrible

originalText.text: This is the worst constumers service that I have ever seen in my life...the white Spanish lady at the front always is in a bad mood, she answered your question like she don't wanna talk to nobody They make you wait 2 hours and 5 minutes with the doctor ðŸ˜žim not coming no more to this place

originalText.text: When you call this office you are always placed on hold forever. Then they supposedly take a message for the Dr. who never calls you back. Iâ€™m taking myself and my family someplace else with etiquette, patient courtesy and most importantly where my family could be treated with dignity. It is an absolute disgrace to call a place where they pay no attention to your request even though you are paying for their services. This clinic will continue to decline and provide poor service if people (patients) donâ€™t speak up. It is a shame that this happens specially around this area. You will not get the respect and service you deserve if you continue treating yourself as second class citizens. I will log my complaint with Department of Health and Office of Professional Medical Conduct (OPMC), right away.

originalText.text: This Doctor is horrible. She doesn't call patients back with their test results. Have given false diagnosis and medications not needed. The staff is rude, disorganized and tends to talk down to patients, when one calls for test results or appointments.
